data.title: Swimming Pool, picnic facilities, bathrooms, tennis courts
data.text: I used to play tennis at Rinconada on a regular basis, there is reasonable parking, a large, well attended swimming pool, tennis courts and available bathrooms, Great for picnics, and one of the most accessible parks in Palo Alto.

data.title: Reserve a space for a child's party or family picnic!
data.text: This is a nice big park, and the best thing about it is that you can reserve a space for a child's birthday party or a family picnic and then invite loads of attendees and you can just sit back and watch them all entertain themselves.  Just provide tons of food and drink and the celebration just creates itself.  Kids really love birthday parties here, both being the featured birthday celebrant and center of attention and also being one of the co-conspirators.  It's a great place for lots of fun for everyone.

data.title: Good walking destination.
data.text: We are lucky to have a place where one can walk and exercise. A swimming pool, library, gardens, toilets and benches are available.

data.title: Riconada has a lot to offer
data.text: Picnic area, tennis courts, swimming pool, kiddie playground, large park. Just wish they had large group bar b que pits.

data.title: Wonderful Local Park with Swimming Pool, Tennis Court, Jr. Zoo, in a Pretty Live Oak and Redwood Setting
data.text:
We have enjoyed going to Rinconada Park a number of times. We like the Junior Museum and  zoo as it has a lot of fun things to do at this 19 acre park.  There are cute rabbits, turtles, raccoons, birds, and more.

One can swim laps at the swimming pool, which is very well maintained.  One can play tennis; there are nine courts. For the children, there are play ground areas.

There are areas for picnics with barbecue areas.  The park is also close to the children's and community theater.

The park has very pretty redwoods and live oaks. There is also nice grassy areas.

Its a wonderful park.  Also by the park is the city library as well as the Palo Alto Art Center.

data.title: В основном для детей
data.text: Это место предназначено в основном для посещений с детьми, которым здесь есть где развернуться. Есть где побегать, полазить, и т.д. При этом, шум от деток стоит еще тот. Мы там устроили нечто вроде пикника, но уехали с головной болью. А американцы все стоически терпят.
